member_organisations:
BGC Brokers LP, 
Liquidnet Europe Limited, 
MarketAxess Europe Limited,  
MTS Group, 
NEX Group Plc, 
Tradeweb Europe Limited
eu_initiatives: MiFIR, MiFID II, Art. 26(5), RTS 22, RTS 24, Derivative Trading Obligations, Equivalence, TOTV, LEI issuer requirements, SFTR, GDPR
organisation_name: Electronic Debt Markets Association - Europe (EDMA Europe)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: To add to the financial stability and soundness of financial markets by organising and representing the community of electronic multilateral fixed income trading venues regulated in Europe, in order to express and have their view and inputs recognised by relevant authorities and other market participants
